snippet: The appointment of John Rice as the deputy director of traffic safety shortly after losing a runoff election has raised concerns over whether he relied on merit or political clout to obtain the position.
lead_paragraph: The appointment of John Rice as the deputy director of traffic safety shortly after losing a runoff election has raised concerns over whether he relied on merit or political clout to obtain the position.

headline.main: Former Alderman’s State Job Raises Questions
headline.print_headline: Former Alderman’s State Job Raises Questions
